meanings.sent1: The tufaceous rocks in the garden were light and porous.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins had a tufaceous appearance due to the tufa deposits.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a tufaceous landscape with fluffy clouds made of tufa.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt tufaceous, like a delicate layer of tufa covering her face.
meanings.sent5: The tufaceous texture of the wall made it crumble easily, just like tufa.

meanings.sent1: The tufaceous path through the forest was cool and smooth underfoot.
meanings.sent2: The tufaceous walls of the cave glistened with moisture from the tufa.
meanings.sent3: The tufaceous statue in the park seemed to be growing tufa as a disguise.
meanings.sent4: Her shoes left tufaceous footprints on the wet tufa ground.
meanings.sent5: The tufaceous pillars of the ancient temple were like giants made of tufa.
